Wonderfone is a revolutionary app that lets you make free calls and texts to anyone in the world using your internet connection. Whether you want to stay in touch with your family and friends, or you need to make business calls abroad, Wonderfone is the perfect solution for you.

## Step 1: Download the Wonderfone app
 
The first thing you need to do is download the Wonderfone app from the official website or the app store of your device. The app is compatible with Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac devices. You can find the download links below:
 
- [Download Wonderfone for Android](https://wonderfone.com/android)
- [Download Wonderfone for iOS](https://wonderfone.com/ios)
- [Download Wonderfone for Windows](https://wonderfone.com/windows)
- [Download Wonderfone for Mac](https://wonderfone.com/mac)

Once you have downloaded the app, install it on your device and open it.
 
## Step 2: Enter your phone number
 
The next step is to enter your phone number in the app. This is the number that will be associated with your Wonderfone account and that will be displayed when you make calls or send texts. Make sure you enter your country code and area code correctly. For example, if you are in the UK, you should enter +44 followed by your 10-digit phone number.

## Step 3: Get your Wonderfone registration code
 
The final step is to get your Wonderfone registration code. This is a 6-digit code that will be displayed on your app's screen. You need to write down this code or take a screenshot of it, as you will need it later to activate your account.

## How to use your Wonderfone registration code
 
To use your Wonderfone registration code, you need to activate your account on the official website. Here are the steps to follow:

1. Go to [https://wonderfone.com/activate](https://wonderfone.com/activate)
2. Enter your phone number and your Wonderfone registration code in the fields provided.
3. Click on "Activate".
4. You will receive a confirmation message on your email and on your app.
5. You are now ready to use Wonderfone!
